# Welcome to Dendron

This is the root of your dendron vault. If you decide to publish your entire vault, this will be your landing page. You are free to customize any part of this page except the frontmatter on top.

## Lookup

This section contains useful links to related resources.

- [Getting Started Guide](https://link.dendron.so/6b25)
- [Discord](https://link.dendron.so/6b23)
- [Home Page](https://wiki.dendron.so/)
- [Github](https://link.dendron.so/6b24)
- [Developer Docs](https://docs.dendron.so/)

Referred [this guide](https://wiki.dendron.so/notes/yg3EL1x9fEe4NMqxUC3jP/).

## Setup
### NPM
In root folder,
```
npm init -y 
npm install -g @dendronhq/dendron-cli@latest
echo .next >> .gitignore
npx dendron publish init
```

### YAML
- Run `Dendron: Configure (yaml)` command.
- publishing the repo named kevinslin.github.io
```
site:
    siteUrl: https://kevinslin.github.io
```
- publishing the repo named dendron-publish-sample
```
site:
    assetsPrefix: /dendron-publish-sample
    siteUrl: https://kevinslin.github.io
```

### Build
```
npx dendron publish dev
```

### Publish
- Run your vscode as administrator.
```
dendron publish export --target github
```

I tried making multiple vaults.

### Make a local vault
- Use `Dendron: Vault Add` command.
- Make local vault.

### Make a remote repo
- Add a repo in github.

### Change local vault into remote repo
- Use `Dendron: Vault Convert` command.
- Change local vault i made into remote.

### How to update remote repo
- Update/Add your note
- Use `Dendron: Workspace: Sync` command.
